translationtableentry.text: Aumentano la salute di 1200 punti.\nSe si utilizzano, ripristinano la salute di un alleato vicino sottraendola al possessore
translationtableentry.result: They add 1200 health.\nIf used, they restore the health of a nearby ally by taking it from the owner

translationtableentry.text: Aumentan la salud en 1200 puntos.\nSi se utilizan, restablecen la salud de un aliado cercano sustrayéndola del poseedor
translationtableentry.result: They add 1200 health.\nIf used, they restore the health of a nearby ally by taking it from the owner

translationtableentry.text: Aumenta l'attacco di 60 punti.\nSe si utilizza, ripristina la salute del possessore sottraendola a un alleato a scelta
translationtableentry.result: Adds 60 damage.\nIf used, it restores the health of the owner by taking it from an ally of choice

translationtableentry.text: Aumenta el ataque en 60 puntos.\nSi se utiliza, restablece la salud del poseedor sustrayéndola de un aliado a elección
translationtableentry.result: Adds 60 damage.\nIf used, it restores the health of the owner by taking it from an ally of choice

translationtableentry.text: Aumenta l'attacco di 20 punti.\nImmagazzina fino a 600 cariche per ripristinare la salute del possessore di 20 punti ogni secondo
translationtableentry.result: Adds 20 damage.\nIt stores up to 600 charges to restore the health of the owner by 20 every second

translationtableentry.text: Aumenta el ataque en 20 puntos.\nAlmacena hasta 600 cargas para restablecer la salud del poseedor en 20 puntos cada segundo
translationtableentry.result: Adds 20 damage.\nIt stores up to 600 charges to restore the health of the owner by 20 every second
